title: Person statement
description: A person statement describes the information known about a natural person at a particular point in time, or from a given submission of information

isComponent.title: Is component
isComponent.description: Does this Person Statement represent a component of an indirect ownership-or-control relationship? Where `isComponent` is 'true': (1) the `statementID` of this Person Statement MUST be an element in the `componentStatementIDs` array of that primary Ownership-or-control Statement, (2) this Person Statement MUST come before that primary Ownership-or-control Statement in a BODS package or stream, (3) the replacement of this Person Statement SHOULD be considered when replacing the primary Ownership-or-control Statement. The primary Ownership-or-control Statement MUST have a `isComponent` value of 'false'.

personType.title: Person type
personType.description: Use the personType codelist. The ultimate beneficial owner of a legal entity is always a natural person. Where the beneficial owner has been identified, but information about them cannot be disclosed, use 'anonymousPerson'. Where the beneficial owner has not been clearly identified, use 'unknownPerson'. Where the beneficial owner has been identified use knownPerson. Where a person has the type 'anonymousPerson' or 'unknownPerson' a reason for the absence of information SHOULD be provided in 'unspecifiedPersonDetails')

unspecifiedPersonDetails.title: Unspecified person details
unspecifiedPersonDetails.description: An explanation of why this person has a `personType` of 'anonymousPerson' or 'unknownPerson'. A `reason` MUST be specified.

reason.title: Reason
reason.description: The reason that an interested party cannot be specified. From the unspecifiedReason codelist.

description.title: Description
description.description: Any supporting information about the absence of a confirmed beneficial owner. This field may be used to provide set phrases from a source system, or for a free-text explanation.

names.title: Names
names.description: One or more known names for this individual.

identifiers.title: Identifiers
identifiers.description: One or more official identifiers for this perrson. Where available, official registration numbers should be provided.

nationalities.title: Nationality
nationalities.description: An array of ISO 2-Digit country codes representing nationalities held by this individual.

isPermanentResidentCa.title: Permanent resident of Canada
isPermanentResidentCa.description: It can contain flag to denote that this person is permanent resident, rather then citizen

birthDate.title: Date of birth
birthDate.description: The date of birth for this individual. Please provide as precise a date as possible in ISO 8601 format. When only the year or year and month is known, these can be given as YYYY or YYYY-MM.

deathDate.title: Death date
deathDate.description: If this individual is no longer alive, provide their date of death. Please provide as precise a date as possible in ISO 8601 format. When only the year or year and month is known, these can be given as YYYY or YYYY-MM.

taxResidencies.title: Tax residency
taxResidencies.description: An array of ISO 2-Digit country codes representing the tax residencies held by this individual.

addresses.title: Addresses
addresses.description: One or more addresses for this entity.

phoneNumber.title: Phone number
phoneNumber.description: A phone number for this individual.

publicationDetails.title: Publication details
publicationDetails.description: Information concerning the original publication of this statement.

source.title: Source
source.description: The source of information about this person, or of information that supports an unknown or anonymous person statement.

missingInfoReason.description: An explanation for why certain details are omitted. required if things other than name are omitted
